
IndexedVCF
==========

Secondary files: ``.idx``

Documentation
-------------

Variant Call Format:

    The Variant Call Format (VCF) specifies the format of a text file 
    used in bioinformatics for storing gene sequence variations. 

    Documentation: https://samtools.github.io/hts-specs/VCFv4.3.pdf
